long_description: If you're a big-mountain rider looking for a connected feel with your board, choose the Now Drive snowboard bindings. These bindings feature increased lateral support for amazing control. All-new Asym Flippit ankle straps can be flipped over: wear them in freestyle mode for added support over the top of your foot, or flip it to freeride mode for ankle support. Glass-filled nylon hangers feature I-beam reinforcements that are rigid and light; floating design offers uninterrupted board flex and quickly transfers power to your edges. Hangers connect to hollow rivet Kingpin pivot point-the fulcrum for all energy transfer; the fulcrum change increases your edge-to-edge power. Stainless-steel rivets are extremely lightweight and strong. Alumi-ring discs reduce the amount of rigid board fixtures to help keep even flex; discs are compatible with all interfaces. Drive Hanger design features a full 15mm EVA footbed for superior comfort and cushioning; tool-free access to mounting hardware. Dual-injected bushings quickly connect to Hangers; bushings apply energy while diffusing board chatter. Includes two sets of bushings in two durometers. Rigid Drive binding highbacks feature a higher medial side that matches leg angle while wider lateral side provides support.
